text: The Dead is an 1987 drama movie directed by John Huston. It is based on a book by James Joyce. Anjelica Huston plays the lead role. == Other websites == *The Dead (1987) at allmovie Category:1987 drama movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by John Huston
title: The Dead (1987)
